### <a name="profile_umask"></a>`profile_umask`

Modifies the default umask of 022

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet

```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_umask` class:

* [`loginumask`](#loginumask)

##### <a name="loginumask"></a>`loginumask`

Data type: `String`

The umask that replaces the default 022 umask
